text: John is the brother of who?
Who is John the brother of?

  (instance kicks-2 Kicking)
  (patient kicks-2 cart-4)
  (instance John-1 Human)
  (instance cart-4 Wagon))

  (instance John-1 Human)
  (instance walk-4 Walking))

  (instance walk-4 Walking))

(and

    (WhenFn walk-5))
  (instance walk-5 Walking))

(and

  (earlier

  (instance walk-4 Walking))
